refnamediv.refpurpose: Test selector alghorithm, gives next selected target in current circumstances.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Run selection alghorithm and print to console informations about next target, which will be selected by selector.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: These programs follow the usual &gnu; command line syntax, with long options starting with two dashes (`-'). A summary of options is included below.
